Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 1 , Atlantic Ocean: 1 . Balearic Sea: 1 , Indian Ocean: 3 , Ionian Sea: 7 , Mediterranean Sea: 3 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 4 ;
total: 20 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FA031: 1 , FAO 37 : 16 , FAO 54 : 3 ;
total: 20 .

Remarks: This species is known mainly from the Mediterranean basin and three localities in the Bay of Bengal (Indian coast). These latter reports need to be confirmed, as early development stages and adults of
Batillipes
species are very similar and a large intraspecific variability has also been observed in this genus (see remarks for
B. gilmartini
). This species is found mainly in the intertidal zone in different types of sand but has also occasionally been collected down to ca. 60 m bsl.
